job_details.degree_required: Degree in Computer Science, IT, or similar field; a master’s is a plus

jd: From: Lovely Kumari, Tanisha systems lovely@tanishasystems.com Reply to: lovely@tanishasystems.com Hello,Hope you are doing well!This is Lovely from Tanisha Systems. I have a job opportunity for you if you are interested, please share me your resume at lovely@tanishasystems.com or call me (732) 377-3746 Ext 735. Title : : Data EngineerLocation : Charlotte, NCExp. 10+ YearsNO GC, USC Job description•Previous experience as a data engineer or in a similar role•Technical expertise with data models, data mining, and segmentation techniques.•Knowledge of programming languages (e.g. Java and Python)•Hands-on experience with SQL database design•Great numerical and analytical skills•Degree in Computer Science, IT, or similar field; a master’s is a plus•Exp. with Flink, Kubernetes, Mongo, Informatica.•Data engineering certification is a plus•Exp. with Java, Kafka/real time streaming dataExp. with Flink, Kubernetes, Mongo, Informatica.•Exp. with Java, Kafka/real time streaming data.
